critically adverb
(SHOWING CRITICISM)
B2 in a way that shows criticism of someone or something, or that shows that you have thought seriously about something, considering what is good and what is bad about it : She looked at him critically but said nothing. We want all our students to develop into mature citizens who are able to think critically.

(IMPORTANTLY)

critically adverb
(VERY BADLY)
